about.paragraph: Over 3 years of experience as a Software Developer. Led embedded development of payment terminals at World POS Solutions, achieving a 60% improvement in app updates, Visa and MasterCard EMV certification, and strong knowledge in the financial sector.

items.description: Led multi-payment gateway integration in high-volume e-commerce platform, optimizing checkout flows and significantly improving conversion metrics.
achievements: +11% authorization rate integrating Stripe, PayPal, Square, Apple Pay and Google Pay
-18% checkout abandonment with optimized flows and improved UX
350+ automated test cases reducing critical bugs by 40%
-45% p95 latency in tax and discount calculations

items.description: Developed and evolved critical multi-country POS platform with EMV integration, optimizing performance and establishing robust CI/CD pipelines.
achievements: Multi-country POS platform with Angular + Spring Boot
-22% transaction failures with EMV logic in C
Lead time from 3 days to 22h with CI/CD pipelines
-38% p95 latency and -25% JVM memory

items.description: Developed custom Odoo modules for comprehensive agricultural automation, improving operational visibility and optimizing production logistics.
achievements: +60% operational visibility with agricultural management modules
-25% downtime with logistics automation
-35% payroll errors with digitized control
Decisions from 3 days to 24h with centralized reports

items.description: Designed multi-supplier inventory system with complete traceability, granular access control and distribution route optimization.
achievements: -28% stock-outs with multi-supplier inventory
-70% unauthorized access with granular control
-32% order preparation time with automated routes
-54% latency in critical queries (520ms→240ms)

items.description: Developed multimodal AI chatbot for hardware store, integrating WhatsApp Business, voice processing and complete CRM automation.
achievements: 95% accuracy in voice recognition with OpenAI Whisper API
-60% query response time with GPT-3.5 Turbo
Multimodal processing: voice, text, images and documents
Complete CRM automation with n8n, Make and HubSpot

contact.title: Get in touch with me
contact.intro: Do you have a project, an idea, or just want to say hello? Fill out the form and I'll get back to you as soon as possible.

cv.name: Johs Salinas
cv.summary: Fullstack Developer with over 3 years building high-performance transactional platforms, inventory systems, e-commerce and conversational AI solutions. End-to-end experience in Java (Spring Boot / Spring Cloud), JavaScript / TypeScript, Node.js, Python (Odoo), Angular, React, C (embedded POS components), OpenAI APIs (GPT-3.5, Whisper) and PostgreSQL. I have developed multimodal chatbots with 95% voice recognition accuracy, optimized APIs reducing latencies up to 45%, integrated WhatsApp Business and CRM automation (n8n, Make, HubSpot), strengthened security (JWT, OWASP mitigation, input hardening and encryption in transit), and automated CI/CD pipelines with unit, integration, e2e (Cypress / Playwright) testing and >90% coverage. I integrate microservices architectures, caching (Redis), queues, observability and conversational AI to achieve scalable, resilient and auditable systems. Combination of product mindset, technical quality and focus on impact metrics (cost, performance, conversion and AI accuracy).

bullets: Contributed to the design and implementation of advanced search features leveraging Elasticsearch and Golang.
Extended and maintained the search indexing pipeline using RabbitMQ and Redis for distributed messaging and data processing.
Collaborated with product managers and UX designers to translate business requirements into scalable technical solutions.
Championed improvements in search performance, relevance, and user experience for both structured and unstructured data.
